participant_1.name: David
participant_1.personality: Caring and reflective, he values family and enjoys being creative. He has a laid-back vibe but can be serious about his work.
participant_1.background: Whats up I'm a 46 year old single dad with kids. My ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. I prefer being inside. I live in California but the recording artist market was dead last year. I am a recording engineer and own my own studio.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Active and health-conscious, she enjoys fitness and has a playful side. She's friendly and enjoys caring for her pets.
participant_2.background: I've short hair. I go to the gym regularly. I like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. Two dogs live with me. Eating is something I do when I am bored.

content.text: I am 22 and still in high school are you a vegan?
I am a vegan, but i do not like meat.
I love fish. I am not a vegan though. Do you like riding horses?
I am in new york. How about you?
Its nice. I am a vegan.
